version.description:
Version number for the current dataset using semantic versioning.
Format: MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH

description.description: A brief (1-2 sentence or similar) description of what’s in the dataset

publisher.description: Organization responsible for collecting and maintaining the data

schema_version.description: The version of the NC-BPAID schema in use. Use current version here as default value.

date_created.description: The date when this dataset was initially created

contact_name.description: The name of a person who can be contacted with questions or for further information about the data

contact_info.description: The email address or phone number to reach someone who can answer questions or provide further information about the data

license.description: The license under which the data is published for use. URL linking to the license agreement; default value https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.

geo_bounding_area.description: Geospatial zone describing the area into which the data falls. This area may be an irregularly shaped polygon or a simple bounding box.

keywords.description:
A set of single words or short phrases that describe the content of the data
For sidewalk network data: "Sidewalks, sidewalk network, pedestrian infrastructure, accessibility, pedestrian."
For bike network data: "Bicycle lanes, bicycle network, biking, bike infrastructure."

attribution.description: Line of text that a data user can copy to properly cite the dataset. TASL format (Title, Author, Source, License) or academic format (ALA, Chicago) recommended.

data_download_url.description: Direct URL to begin downloading the data; should not require additional clicks or steps besides visiting the URL to begin download

data_docs_url.description: URL to access a data documentation booklet or site covering methodologies and other technical aspects of the data

data_dictionary_url.description: URL to access the data dictionary for the dataset, in PDF, HTML or JSON format

data_service_endpoint_url.description: URL to access the data via a data service, such as Data.gov (catalog.data.gov/dataset/…), ArcGIS Online (ex. Feature service or feature layer link) or Socrata

rights_usage_limits_restricts.description: Text or a URL providing greater detail on how the data can and should be used, what rights are reserved, the scope of the data and any other useful information. Populate with either a text statement or with a URL linking to a text statement or policy

quality_validation.description: Statement describing the methods used to ensure quality and to validate the data, providing quantitative results where possible; can be a link to a web page or tool containing more information.

date_modified.description: The date when this dataset was last updated

checksum.description: An MD5 sum associated with the dataset in its current state, used to check if the data has changed since last accessed; new checksums should be generated each time the data is updated.

freq_cadence.description: How often the full data is updated – for example, when new lidar is collected or a new field study is conducted; do not use for minor updates (ex. Correcting a few rows). Use values from the Dublin Core frequency specification.

modification_notes.description: Text statement describing recent updates or modifications that regular users might want to know about.

collection_period_start.description:
Beginning date of the period during which data was collected; approximation is acceptable. Include at least the month and the year if possible.
If frequency / cadence = ‘continuous,’ leave blank

collection_period_end.description:
Ending date of the period during which data was collected; approximation is acceptable. Include at least the month and the year if possible.
If frequency / cadence = ‘continuous,’ leave blank

collection_method.description: List of the methods used to collect and extract the data.
listed_values: Satellite / aerial; LIDAR; field survey / manual; GPS survey; hand traced or tagged; AI interpretation; transformation from another format / database

collection_notes.description: Text statement providing additional detail about data collection methods and approach, including selection, tools and data processing.

conforms_to.description: List of the URLs of other specifications to which attributes within the data also conform.

source_dataset.description: Either a link or a citation (title, publisher and publication date) to the primary dataset used to create the data; in many cases, this data will be satellite or LIDAR data used for extracting transportation elements.

source_dataset_type.description: The type of dataset listed under Primary Source Dataset URL or Citation.

addl_sources.description: List of URLs or citations for additional data sources used besides the primary data source – ie for blending, for extracting additional features, etc.

source_notes.description: Text note describing any additional information about data sources, including how they were collected, any known issues and cleaning and processing.

contributor_consulted.description: Text statement acknowledging people or organizations who contributed or who were consulted in creation of the dataset.

used_by.description: Text statement describing related datasets or projects – for example, if another organization takes this data and layers on additional features. Include URLs where possible.

funding_organization.description: Name of the organization(s) who provided funding to enable any part of the effort to produce the dataset.
